CustomField.description: When set to TRUE, if the 'Hide Timesheet Manager Approve' setting within the TimeCards Config custom setting is set to TRUE, the user will be able to use the "Approve On Behalf" button
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When set to TRUE, if the 'Hide Timesheet Manager Approve' setting within the TimeCards Config custom setting is set to TRUE, the user will be able to use the "Approve On Behalf" button
CustomField.label: Enable Timesheet Manager Approve
